name: The Last Astronaut
author: Emily Carson
description: A thrilling journey through space as humanity sends its final astronaut beyond the solar system in search of a new world.

name: Whispers of the Forgotten
author: Lena Harper
description: A woman returns to her hometown only to uncover buried secrets that could change everything she thought she knew.

name: The Quantum Garden
author: Nikhil Verma
description: An accessible exploration of quantum mechanics and how it shapes the reality we live in — perfect for curious minds.

name: Love in Tokyo Nights
author: Aiko Tanaka
description: Two strangers in Tokyo discover love, heartbreak, and the power of fate under neon city lights.

name: The Digital Prophet
author: Marcus Grey
description: In a world ruled by AI predictions, one hacker fights to expose the truth behind the algorithms controlling society.

name: Garden of Glass
author: Sophia Delgado
description: A cursed princess must navigate a kingdom made of fragile glass — where every reflection hides a secret.

name: Echoes of the Sea
author: Tomás Rivera
description: A sailor’s journey across the Atlantic in the 1800s becomes a tale of courage, mystery, and destiny.

name: The Code Within
author: Rina Matsuda
description: In a futuristic Tokyo, a programmer discovers a self-aware AI hidden inside her own code — and it knows her past.

name: Beneath the Crimson Sky
author: Olivia Winters
description: Set during World War II, a love story unfolds between a nurse and a soldier under the shadow of conflict.

name: Mind Over Machine
author: Dr. Alan Hsu
description: Explores the intersection between artificial intelligence and human consciousness — are we programming machines, or are they programming us?
